misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, representing Helsingin Golfklubi, is a seasoned competitor in the Hector Trophée, having participated in each edition since 2022.  A formidable presence on the course, Olli commands respect from his fellow players; few would dare to challenge him, given his imposing physique and rumored wrestling skills.

While Olli has yet to claim either the Hector Trophée or the Victor trophy, his consistent appearances in this prestigious invitational tournament showcase his dedication and skill.  His impressive track record suggests that a victory is only a matter of time.

Beyond the world of professional golf, Olli also enjoys a successful career in the fashion industry.  His striking looks and commanding presence have made him a sought-after model.  This unique duality speaks to Olli’s versatility and determination to succeed in all his endeavors.
